All the portlets are in the _social-portlet.war_ file.

|| Portlet name || Description ||
| *Members Portlet* | Enables users to search for Space members or list Space members in the alphabetical order. |
| *My Spaces Portlet* | Displays the Space page where you can add new Spaces, search for Spaces or list Spaces in the alphabetical order. |
| *Space Activity Stream Portlet* | To share Spaces activities. |
| *Invitations Portlet* | Lists all people that invite users. |
| *Requests Portlet* | Lists all invitations requested by users. |
| *Invitation Spaces Portlet* | Enables users to search for spaces where they are member or manager. |
| *Pending Spaces Portlet* | Displays the *Space requests to join* page, where you can search for Spaces, list spaces in the alphabetical order and view all the pending requests to join Spaces. |
| *Public Spaces Portlet* | Displays the *Public Spaces* page, where you can search for Spaces, list Spaces in the alphabetical order and view all available public Spaces to join. |
| *User Activity Stream Portlet* | Updates and shares the user's activities and/or status. |
| *People Portlet* | Displays the *People* page, where you can find people, list people in the alphabetical order. |
| *Connections Portlet* | To display the *Connections* page, where you can access your network, invitations to connect or connection requests. |
| *User Profile Portlet* | To display the *User profile* page, where users can view and edit their basic information, contacts, experience, avatar. |
